intro: Parastranthus flavus, commonly known as the yellow starfish plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Aizoaceae. It is native to South Africa and is characterized by its fleshy, succulent leaves and star-shaped yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. It is a low-growing perennial that produces small, clustered flowers during the summer months. Due to its unique appearance and hardy nature, it is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in arid gardens.
